name: Snow Eagle
description:
Fly through the snow and hunt for your next meal. Play Snow Eagle Simulator.

Control this huge Snow Eagle as she takes flight across this massive open world snow covered terrain. Battle Polar Bears, Moose, Rabbits, Penguin, and Fox, Owl, Wolf, Eagle. Help him grow from a weak bird into a giant Snow Eagle. Hunt down your wild enemies across this massive open world snow covered terrain.

Top Game HIghlights:
**Thrive and Survive the harsh winter climate
**Super huge 3D Tundra Landscape
**9 Different Snow Animals including Penguin, Fox, Owl
**Dynamic times of day plus weather changes
**Upgrade your snow eagle Speed, Strength, and Stamina
**6 Head to Head Survival Battle Scenarios
**12 Bonus Challenging Simulator Adventures


9 WILD ANIMALS INCLUDED
Polar Bears, Moose, Rabbits, Penguin, and Fox, Owl, Wolf, Eagle and more . . .

AWESEOME 3D HD GAMEPLAY
Easy to control, highly addictive gameplay, with epic 3D graphics and open world style layout.

UPGRADE THE HUNTING EAGLE
Use your meat points to improve your Stamina, Strength, or Speed

DYNAMIC DAY AND NIGHT CONDITIONS
No two games will ever be the same. Each time you play it will be a very unique experience.

SPECIAL BATTLE SIMULATIONS
Try to Survive these challenging battles. Wrestle with other eagles and owls.


Follow us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/wildfootgames

Please send your suggestions to wildfootgames@gmail.com. Try our other 3D sims like Dinosaur, Wolf, Snake Simulator, Lion, Owl, Bear Simulator, and Gorilla SIm. We are working toward a multiplayer version.
